annotations.description: In this episode the boys discuss creating the next Mojito, ponders the legacy of Sasha Petraske of Milk and Honey, shows us a use for oxidized wine and discu...
annotations.title: A Shot At Creating The Next Mojito with The JFK Harris

textContent:
2oz (60ml) White Rum
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Simple Syrup
8-10 Mint Leaves
.25oz (7.5ml) Red Wine Floated

Muddle mint with juice and syrup
Shake and strain into rocks glass with ice. 
Float with red wine

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u_7YfvWIG04
title: JFK Harris
